original_text: And the Lord said to Moses, “This very thing that you have spoken I will do, for you have found favor in my sight, and I know you by name.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 네가 말하는 이 일도 내가 하리니 너는 내 목전에 은총을 입었고 내가 이름으로도 너를 앎이니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said to Moses,
This very thing that you have spoken
for you have found favor in my sight,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네가 내 눈에 은총을 입었음이라

sentences.original_text: and I know you by name.
